Image Placeholder Source

a helper for using structured data to populate various image placeholder sources.

npm install img-placeholder-src
Docs

Star

  • Playground
  • Image Sources
  • Image Variations
  • Service Override
This page is meant to serve as an overview of what the module can do. For details, reference the API docs

Playground

Choose your options and hit update to load the new placeholder image. Keep in mind, not all options are supported by each placeholder image service.

* indicates required

Image Sources

Here are examples of all the provided image placeholder services as well as an example of a custom image service. Each of these examples uses the same image data but the url is generated from a difference IPS image service.

See Usage docs for details

Default Source

Default Srcset

Lorempixel Source

Lorempixel Srcset

Fillmurray Source

Fillmurray Srcset

Placecage Source

Placecage Srcset

Placeimg Source

Placeimg Srcset

Custom Source (placekitten)

Custom Srcset (placekitten)

Image Variations

Passing the unique option increments the photo image size by one. This forces the image services to provide a differnt image, rather that sending the same image for match dimension requests.

See API docs for details

Non-Unique

Unique

Service Override

Setting a serviceOverride option when initailizing a IPS instance will force all placeholder images to use that service.

See API docs for details

placecage
lorempixel
placeimg
fillmurray

Special Thanks

To the placeholder image services. Without them, this module would not be possible useful.

placeholdit, placeimg, fillmurray, placecage, lorempixel, placekitten
